Column.Name: Document Attached
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue > 0, TRUE, "Please attach a document before sending for signature" )

Column.Name: Email Reply To
Column.Formula: IF(ISBLANK([Email Reply To]), EBMS_GET_ROLE_EMAIL_ADDRESSES([Originator], TRUE), [Email Reply To])

Column.Name: Sign Date
Column.Formula:
IF( [Bypass Approval] = TRUE, COALESCE([Sign Date], NOW()),
[Sign Date] )

Column.Name: Line Approval Processed
Column.Formula: IF( OR( [Signer Status] = "completed", [Signer Status] = "declined" ), TRUE, [Line Approval Processed] )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $result := ARRAY_SELECT( [DocuSign Signer Statuses], $(i, item) IF( HASH_GET($item, "status") = "declined", HASH_GET($item, "declinedDate"), HASH_GET($item, "signedDate") ) );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECT( $result, $(i, item) IF( [Bypass Approval]#$i = TRUE, [Sign Date]#$i, $item ) )

LET $result := ARRAY_SELECT( [DocuSign Signer Statuses], $(i, item) HASH_GET($item, "declinedReason") )
RETURN $result

Event.Name: DocuSign Completed
Event.Description: Make this whatever you want when the document is signed

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: LET $lineToPartApprove := ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Name]); RETURN HASH( "guid", [Approval GUID]#$lineToPartApprove, "username", [Username]#$lineToPartApprove, "status", [Signer Status]#$lineToPartApprove, "datetime", [Sign Date]#$lineToPartApprove )

FieldEntry.Formula: IF(AND(ISBLANK([DocuSign Error Message]), ISBLANK([DocuSign Envelope ID])), "Possible network error", [DocuSign Error Message])

ChangeFieldValues.Description: If there is a network error then capture that it was a network error

FieldEntry.Formula: HASH( "before", EACH loaded.[Signer Status], "after", EACH [Signer Status] )
